segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting ruined, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless she’s being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, but she’s too busy ignoring the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s just going to keep drying that plate until the whole kitchen floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to damage everything, and she’s not even looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet she’ll blame the kids when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that one dish, it’s ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she at least turns off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
